1: Lord, who can live in your sacred tent? Who can stay on your holy mountain?
2: Anyone who lives without blame and does what is right. They speak the truth from their heart.
3: They don't tell lies about other people. They don't do wrong to their neighbors. They don't say anything bad about them.
4: They hate evil people. But they honor those who have respect for the Lord. They keep their promises even when it hurts. They do not change their mind.
5: They lend their money to poor people without charging interest. They don't accept money to harm those who aren't guilty. Anyone who lives like that will always be secure.
